name: Hitbox Dark - (Dark Grey/Lime Green)
description: This is a dark grey and lime green color theme for HitBox.tv. The other themes here make the text extremely hard to read, and this theme also makes the home page dark unlike the others. This theme also makes the text green, for example the home page takes for usernames.
additional_info:
This theme was created by the HitBox user http://hitbox.tv/DatDerpyGuy
If you would like a theme made, contact me via Twitter @DatDerpyGuy

** Update: March 5, 2014 ** I have updated this style to where it doesn't literally break every single site.
